title: Language Learning Design for Implementing Democratic Values in Islamic Boarding Schools

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Islamic education knowledge and foundational grasp of democratic principles
context.additional_context: Emphasizes language proficiency for realizing democratic values in Islamic dormitory settings. Cultivates the ability to apply knowledge to real situations through case study-based approaches.

learning_goals: Learners can write documents explaining democratic decision-making processes in an Islamic boarding school environment.
Learners can linguistically present strategies for implementing democratic values by analyzing case studies.
Learners can apply communication skills necessary for conflict resolution through dormitory life simulations.
Learners can interpret Islamic educational materials that reflect democratic values.
Learners can articulate collaborative problem-solving processes in group activities through linguistic expression.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
